Question
========

Below are 4 scatterplots (called A, B, C and D) of X and Y. In which of the 4 scatterplots is the equation of the regression equation equal to Y = 61 + 0.88 X?

![](uva-equation-288-nl-graph01.png)

Answerlist
----------

* A
* B
* C
* D

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* A: Incorrect
* B: Incorrect
* C: Incorrect
* D: Correct
